description: Fetches detailed weather data from www.wunderground.com. Creates up to six virtual devices for humidity, pressure, current conditions, wind, solar radiation and forecasts.
interval_helper: Specifies weather data refresh interval in minutes
location_helper: Either Country/City, Latitude-Longitude, Airport code or weatherundergound pws ID (see http://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/docs?d=data/index)
title: WeatherUndergound module
